array.string: # Try the default location in HOME directory first if [ -f "$HOME/apple_music_lastfm_scrobbler.sh" ]; then "$HOME/apple_music_lastfm_scrobbler.sh" # Then try the repository location if user kept it there elif [ -f "$HOME/Documents/xcode/applemusic_macos_scrobbler/apple_music_lastfm_scrobbler.sh" ]; then "$HOME/Documents/xcode/applemusic_macos_scrobbler/apple_music_lastfm_scrobbler.sh" # Allow for custom locations based on where the user cloned the repo elif [ -d "$HOME/github/applemusic_macos_scrobbler" ]; then "$HOME/github/applemusic_macos_scrobbler/apple_music_lastfm_scrobbler.sh" else echo "Error: Could not find the scrobbler script. Please update the path in $HOME/Library/LaunchAgents/com.user.apple_music_lastfm_scrobbler.plist" exit 1 fi
